title: Manga Grimm Douwa: Midara de Yokubuka na Akazukin
original_name: まんがグリム童話 淫らで欲深な赤ずきん
sinopse:
1. Akazukin (Little Red Riding Hood)
2. Yuki no Joou (The Snow Queen)
3. Oyayubi-hime (Princess thumb/Thumbelina)
4. Ari to Kirigirisu (The Ant and the Grasshopper)
5. Aoi Tori (The Blue Bird)
6. Kohaku no Uroko
